title: Indecision is a choice
excerpt: Commitment, persistence, the stuff of grit, it’s not fickle. Just the opposite. It’s the choice to continue regardless of the outcome.

children.text: Commitment, persistence, the stuff of grit, it’s not fickle. Just the opposite. It’s the choice to continue regardless of the outcome.
Hesitancy, doubt, trying until something better comes along? That’s the stuff indecision is made of.
Exhausted by indecision? Fatigued by compromise? Tired of merely trying? Disillusioned by incessant quitting?
Immerse yourself. Live with the consequences. Don’t look back.
